name: just colors!
description:
This game is all about colors. 

Mix them, stack them and create complete lines of the same color in two awsome game modes: 

Mix colors 

Mix two colors to get a new full square to complite lines. Three of them will make a matching line on the 4x4 board.

Stack colors

Put colors on each other. Three of the same color will make a complete line on this 3x3 board.

Can you beat your highscore?
